name: 2048 Cesar Roman Empire Puzzle Conquest - Free
name_original: 2048 Cesar Roman Empire Puzzle Conquest - Free
description:
2048 style game are hard but imagine with roman numbers ... Can you reach MMXLVIII ?

Will you be invited to the table of honors or throw to the lion in the coliseum?

Side the block to match same roman number - if you match it - BOOM it create a higher number. Let's see if you can find MMXLVIII and win the Roman Empire.

*** This game is so hard that no one in the staff had win the game yet!

Send us your most welcome comments!
You can leave them at: support@meilleursjeuxmobiles.com
